  1. """Templatetags for the ``simple_events`` app."""
  2. from django import template
  4. from simple_translation.middleware import filter_queryset_language
  6. from ..models import EventCategory, EventTitle
  9. register = template.Library()
  12. @register.assignment_tag
  13. def get_event_categories():
  14. """Returns all categories in the database."""
  15. return EventCategory.objects.all().order_by('position')
  18. @register.assignment_tag(takes_context=True)
  19. def get_events(context, amount=5):
  20. """
  21. Returns upcoming events.
  23. :param request: The current request.
  24. :param amount: The number of events that should be returned.
  26. """
  27. request = context.get('request')
  28. qs = EventTitle.objects.filter(
  29. event__is_published=True).order_by('event__start_date')
  30. qs = filter_queryset_language(request, qs)
  31. return qs[:amount]
